name: Kicking Horse IPA
description: A hoppy, refreshing IPA with notes of citrus and pine. Brewed locally in the heart of the mountains using pure spring water and premium hops.

name: Mountain Valley Red Blend
description: A robust red blend with flavors of blackberry, cherry, and subtle oak. Perfect for pairing with hearty mountain meals.

name: Alpine Craft Whiskey
description: Small-batch whiskey aged in oak barrels with notes of vanilla, caramel, and a smooth finish. Perfect for sipping by the fire after a day on the slopes.

name: Local Artisan Cheese
description: Handcrafted artisan cheese made from locally sourced milk. Rich, creamy, and perfect for your charcuterie board.

name: Smoky Mountain Gin
description: A unique gin infused with mountain botanicals and a hint of smokiness. Bold and distinctive, perfect for craft cocktails.

name: Organic Maple Syrup
description: Pure organic maple syrup harvested from sustainable forests. Rich amber color with a deep, complex flavor.

name: Wildflower Honey Ale
description: A light, refreshing ale with subtle honey notes from local wildflower honey. Smooth and easy drinking.

name: Rosé All Day
description: A crisp, dry rosé with notes of strawberry and citrus. Perfect for summer evenings on the patio.
